about_the_game:
Get ready for the ultimate battle in a universe invaded by hostile alien races!
In "SpiderTank vs Aliens," the fate of the world is in your hands. Cities and towns on our planet have been attacked by power-hungry alien races. Only you can stop this threat.
Game Features:
• Unlimited Action: Destroy alien races in different parts of the world. Each defeated enemy drops valuable gems that unlock new attacks and mechatronic upgrades.
• Varied Missions: Enter deadly labyrinths, deactivate bombs before they destroy cities, and eliminate alien eggs before they hatch.
• Epic Battles: Fight colossal monsters, destroy portals, and face advanced alien engineering that threatens to extract super-powerful gems, rare throughout the galaxy.
• Advanced Combat machines: Start your mission with the fearsome spider tank and protect civilians from alien annihilation. As you progress and collect more gems, you can acquire more powerful machines such as:
o CrustaceanX: Creates electromagnetic fields to defend and attack.
o MechaRaptor: Fires homing missiles from its tail to destroy enemies.
o MechaDragon: The ultimate weapon that shoots atomic rays, missiles from its back, volcanic explosive spheres, and small cannons.
• Immersive and Terrifying Environments: Explore tension-filled scenarios with lethal alien species and a greenish mist that signals the invasive presence.
Warning!
Beware of Human-Eating Insectoids and Laser-Shooting Eyes!
Each level presents a new challenge with detailed tutorials, taking you from the ruins of modern cities to the mysterious sands of Egypt. Your ultimate goal is to destroy the Great Serpent that fell from the sky, unleashing chaos.
Are you ready to save the world?
Join the resistance and fight with high-tech machines to eradicate the alien invasion! Download "SpiderTank vs Aliens" today and become the hero Earth needs!
Don't miss out!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS o SteamOS 2.0 (32-bit) or (64-bit).
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or AMD Radeon HD 7770 with at least 1 GB of VRAM, with drivers compatible with OpenGL 4.3.
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with PulseAudio, ALSA or similar.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 (Sierra) or newer versions
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or higher.
  • Storage: 700 GB available space

name: Spider-Tank  vs Aliens

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 or newer versions (32-bit) or (64-bit).
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card with at least 1 GB of VRAM (for example, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or AMD Radeon HD 7770).
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible.

short_description: Evolve your mechatronics, get new powers and annihilate all the alien races!!!
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
